verses.name: Leviticus 15:17
verses.text: And every garment, and every skin, whereon is the seed of copulation, shall be washed with water, and be unclean until the even.

verses.name: Leviticus 15:18
verses.text: The woman also with whom man shall lie with seed of copulation, they shall both bathe themselves in water, and be unclean until the even.

verses.name: Leviticus 15:19
verses.text: And if a woman have an issue, and her issue in her flesh be blood, she shall be put apart seven days: and whosoever toucheth her shall be unclean until the even.
